Player History
Signed as a free agent by San Diego on 4/1/1985 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 8/17/1985 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 6 days...
Traded from San Diego to Detroit on 7/5/1990 (Going to SD: P Jeff Brantley. Going to DET: LF Moises Alou, P Bob Sebra, P Greg W. Harris)...
Earned first career win on 7/13/1990...
Injured on 7/30/1991 with a Ruptured Tricep Tendon, out for 4-5 weeks...
2/2/1992: Gets a new one-year contract worth $501,429 through salary arbitration...
